name: Pizza In the Woods
description:
A pizza slice has an existential crisis and goes for a walk through a mysterious forest made up of plants and trees used to make chemotherapy drugs. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can walk with the pizza using W/A/S/D+mouse+buttons  or a game controller. 

You have a flashlight for when it gets dark and can throw things and grab things with mouse buttons or game pad face buttons. 

Press 2 for 4k

Press 3 for 1080p

Press 4 for 720p

Press esc to quit

Leave idle  for around 30 seconds to let AI take pizza over. The entire walking simulation takes around 20 minutes or so.
